bookSourceComment:
来自Boavine
自用，注意该站阅读需科学上网。你也可以把源URL改为镜像网站（自己找）
为方便阅读，可以科学上网缓存后关闭书籍更新即可随时阅读。也可以将源类型改为3(文件)然后下载阅读。无需操作或登录即可直接阅读成人向作品。
如有疑问请联系boavine@163.com

【2024.4.5更新】
相较AO3-2 1、增加了下载功能 2、去除了简介中的donate宣传

【下载说明】
将源类型改成3（文件）！
如果不想要epub
可以将下载地址中的li.1改为对应序号
li.0 AZW3; li.1 epub; li.2 MOBI; li.3 PDF; li.4 html

ruleContent.content:
<js>
c = cookie.getKey("https://read.douban.com","dbcl2")

cok = String(/\d+:/.test(c)?c.match(/(\d+):/)[1]:"anonymous");

t = java.getString("$.data");


script = `<script>
t = "${t}";
function name(t){
  const e = Uint8Array.from(window.atob(t), (t=>t.charCodeAt(0)))
    , i = e.buffer
    , u = e.length - 16 - 13
    , d = new Uint8Array(i,u,16)
    , p = new Uint8Array(i,0,u)
    , f = {};
    f.name = "AES-CBC",
    f["iv"] = d,
  c = new TextEncoder().encode("${cok}");
  return window["crypto"]["subtle"]["digest"]("SHA-256", c)
  .then(t=>window["crypto"]["subtle"]["importKey"]("raw", t, "AES-CBC", !0, ["decrypt"])
  .then(t=>window["crypto"]["subtle"]["decrypt"](f, t, p))
  
  .then(t=>JSON.parse((new TextDecoder).decode(t)))
 .then(t=>t.posts[0].contents));
}
(async function () {
  result = await name(t)
  })();
</script>`;
result = java.webView(script,baseUrl,"result");
result = result.match(/"(?:content|text)":"([\s\S]*?)","/g).join("\n");
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
list=JSON.parse(result);
Json=[]
for(i in list){
if(list[i].title.indexOf(java.get('key'))>-1){
Json.push(list[i])
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>
$.[*]
ruleSearch.name: $.title

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
aid = "{{$.id}}"==""?"{{@@href}}".match(/ebook\/(\d+)/)[1]:"{{$.id}}";
url = "https://read.douban.com/j/article_v2/get_reader_data";
body = "aid="+aid;
result = url +","+ JSON.stringify({
	"method":"POST",
	"body":String(body),
	"headers":{
		"referer":"https://read.douban.com/reader/column/{{baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\//)[1]}}/chapter/"+aid+"/",
		"X-CSRF-TOKEN":java.get("X-CSRF-TOKEN")
		}
	});
</js>

var end = last.match(/.*\/(\d+.*).html/)[1]
var lst = []

result = lst
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header))
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>

ruleContent.content: if(baseUrl.match(/album-info/)){ text="↓复制下面网址，在书架选择◎添加网址◎，粘贴网址，即可阅读本书↓\n"+baseUrl+"\n简介："+JSON.parse(result).data.album.content }else if(baseUrl.match(/post_id/)){ json=JSON.parse(result) pics=json.data.post.pics; video=json.data.post.video?"视频链接："+json.data.post.video:"" preview_text=json.data.post.preview_text?json.data.post.preview_text:"" imgs=""; for(i in pics){ imgs+='\n' } result=json.data.post.content+imgs+video; result!=""?result:preview_text+"\n💰"+json.data.post.min_price+"\n"+json.data.post.has_right_errMsg }else{ result="↓↓复制下面文字，编辑书源，添加至发现规则↓↓\n"+book.name+"的作品集::"+baseUrl.replace(/page=1/,'page={\{page}}') }

loginUrl:
<js>
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="https://afdian.net/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
let header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
</js>

<js>
jms=JSON.parse(result);
jm=String(jms.body.content).split("a2o@");
function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// 秒 
var theTime1 = 0;// 分 
var theTime2 = 0;// 小时 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"秒"; 
if(theTime1 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"分"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"小时"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){
key="S3VqaWFuZ0FwcDc0NzYwNQ==";
iv=jm[0];
data=jm[1];
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);
with(javaImport) {
    function decode(content) {
        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
             byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(decode);
            gZIPInputStream = new GZIPInputStream(byteArrayInputStream);
            bArr = String(" ").getBytes(); 
            while (true) {
                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}
else{"新章节需要解封\n"+"解锁时间还需："+formatSeconds(String(jms.body.left_seconds))}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var arr_id = java.getElements('#txt@dd')
var arr_data_id =  java.getStringList('#txt@dd@data-id')
var len = arr_id.length
var arr = ''
for(let i=0; i<len; i++) {
for(let j=0; j<arr_data_id.length; j++) {

if(i.toString() == arr_data_id[j].toString()){

arr+=arr_id[j]
}
}}
arr
</js>
